We're creating new routes for alternative university admission

Admission

We're creating new routes for alternative University Admission via IJMB, JUPEB, NABTEB and Cambridge. Valid in Nigeria and overseas

Approved

Our establishment has been approved By NUC, so you can rest assured of Legitimacy

Affordable

Our offer is brought to you at a relatively affordable price and no JAMB is required

Why choose JUPEB?

Enrolling with us gives applicants the opportunity to choose from our list of partnering JUPEB Study centres across the country which is closer to applicant area, among other advantages like;..

Our Vision

We are a link to College(s) where design and social research drive approaches to studying issues of our time, such as democracy, urbanization, technological change, economic empowerment, sustainability, migration, & globalization. We connect students to preeminent intellectual and creative centers for effective engagement in Preliminary and Advanced Studies.

Our Mission

Our mission is to provide a high-quality, comprehensive, and meaningful education for all students. Each student will be treated as an individual, given the tools to be a better learner, and taught to function as a member of a group and as a productive member of society.

Our Services

ALPHA ALEVEL REGISTRATION AND SERVICES is a registered educational entity which has been dealing with placement of students for Basic and Advanced level Educational related programmes since 2014 till date. At ALPHA A'LEVEL REGISTRATION, We register students for A'Level programs like IJMB, JUPEB and CAMBRIDGE and then post them to desired locations where they will run the program.
